issue_obverse_figure_s: Right profile of Wahram II on frontal bust
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown cap; terminating in an eagle's wing at the back; covered korymbos; plain diadem, diadem ribbons commencing above ball of hair pointing upwards; earing consisting of two elements; tunica, neck-line edged with double row of pearls; jugate bust of Wahram's wife with right right profile on a frontal bust; the two busts small bust with left profile on a frontal bust; crown adorned with eagle's head; pearl diadem, pendent diadem ribbon; holding in left hand diadem wreath ending in two short plain diadem, ribbed ribbon; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 11 h l. o. mzdysn bgy wrhr'n MRKAn MRKA 'yr'n W 'nyr'n MNW ctry MN yzd'n| mazdēsn bay Wahrām šāhān šāh Ērān ud Anērān kē čihr az yazdān|"The Mazda-worshiping divine Wahram, King of Kings of the Iranians and non-Iranians, whose seeds/splendour is from the gods
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: base consisting of two elements; square altar shaft; altar ribbon across shaft, to the left and right of altar shaft ribbons pointing downwards; four altar slabs; altar flames depicted with parallel strokes; to the left of the altar attendant with stylized crown of Wahram II, right hand extended towards Anahita, left hand resting on scabbard, to the right of the altar attendant with stylized crown of Anahita, handing over diadem wreath to Wahram II; dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: 3 h l. i NWRA ZY, 9 h l. o. wrhr'n| ādur ī Wahrām|“the fire of Wahram”
